job_description:
About the Role:
We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Engineer with strong experience in Pythonbased development and a passion for building scalable, cloud-native applications. In
this role, you’ll work across the stack—from designing backend services in Python to
building responsive frontends—while also exploring opportunities to integrate
Generative AI (GenAI) technologies. Whether you're already experienced with GenAI or
eager to dive into it, this is an exciting opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge
products and solutions.
What You’ll Do:
• Full-Stack Development: Design, build, and maintain robust, scalable web
applications using Python (Flask, Django, FastAPI) on the backend and modern
frontend frameworks like React, Angular, or Vue.js.
• GenAI Exploration & Integration: Collaborate with AI teams to integrate or
explore LLMs and generative AI capabilities (e.g., GPT-4, transformers, RAG
pipelines) into products. Prior experience is welcome; openness to learn is a
must.
• Architect Scalable Systems: Contribute to architectural decisions ensuring
systems are secure, maintainable, and cloud-native.
• Cloud Engineering: Deploy, monitor, and optimize applications using AWS,
GCP, or Azure, with a focus on performance and reliability.
• Collaboration & Mentorship: Work closely with product managers, designers,
and fellow engineers. Mentor junior developers and support peer growth.
• Agile Practices: Participate in code reviews, maintain high-quality code
standards, and contribute to continuous improvement.
• Innovate & Learn: Stay current with emerging trends in full-stack development,
cloud services, and AI technologies, bringing new ideas to the team.
On your first day, we’ll expect you to have:
• Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s in Computer Science, Engineering, or a
related field.
• Experience: 5–8 years of hands-on experience in full-stack software
development, with strong backend expertise in Python.
• Tech Stack Proficiency:
o Backend: Python with Django, Flask, or FastAPI
o Frontend: React, Angular, or Vue.js
o Cloud: AWS, GCP, or Azure (deployment, monitoring, optimization)
• AI Exposure: Experience or interest in LLMs, transformers, or GenAI tools (e.g.,
OpenAI APIs). Willingness to learn and apply AI concepts in production systems.
• Strong Engineering Practices: Clean code, CI/CD, unit testing, version control
(Git), and agile development.
• Team Player: Comfortable working in cross-functional teams and mentoring
junior engineers.
• Bonus: Prior experience in building or integrating GenAI models or working with
AI/ML teams.
